generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, which is the main surface for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: There is a designated pedestrian area along the edge of the road, separated by poles and curbs, where people are walking.

- fence: A white fence is visible on the left side of the image, separating the pedestrian area from the street.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including traffic light poles and sign poles, along the sidewalk and road.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on the left side of the image, mounted on a pole.
- traffic sign: A red and white triangular traffic sign (indicating a yield or give way) is visible on a pole near the sidewalk.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the sidewalk and in front of the buildings.
- person: Multiple people are visible walking on the sidewalk, some carrying bags or backpacks.
- rider: A person is riding a bicycle on the road, visible near the sidewalk.
- car: A black car is parked on the right side of the image, near the sidewalk.
- motorcycle: Not present.
- bicycle: Not present (the bicycle is being ridden by a person, so it is not classified as a separate object).
